title: Settings

ai.backendModeHint: Choose Gemini API or Vertex AI
ai.apiKeyHint: Used to call Google Gemini API, please keep it safe
ai.textModelHint: Used for text generation and understanding
ai.imageModelHint: Used for image generation and editing
ai.vertexLocationHint: Select the nearest GCP location for best performance
ai.vertexCredentialsHint: GCP service account key JSON file content
ai.openaiApiKeyHint: Used to call OpenAI compatible API, please keep it safe
ai.openaiImageApiKeyHint: Leave empty to use general API Key
ai.openaiImageApiKeyPlaceholder: Leave empty to use general API Key
ai.openaiBaseUrlHint: Can be customized for third-party compatible services
ai.openaiImageBaseUrlHint: Leave empty to use general Base URL
ai.openaiImageBaseUrlPlaceholder: Leave empty to use general Base URL
ai.openaiImageModeHint: Select API endpoint type for image generation and editing
ai.openaiImageModeAutoHint: Auto select based on model name (dall-e/gpt-image uses Image API, others use Chat API)
ai.openaiCompatDesc: Dedicated Image API mode requires /v1/images/* compatible endpoints; Chat mode supports full features like image editing and blending.
ai.openaiStreamModeHint: Some third-party OpenAI relay services only provide streaming interfaces
ai.openaiTextStream: Use streaming requests for text/chat models
ai.openaiImageStream: Use streaming requests for image models
ai.cloudEndpointUrlHint: Configure cloud service API endpoint address
ai.cloudTokenHint: Token for cloud service API authentication (optional)
ai.cloudDesc: Cloud service will handle all AI processing tasks, local client only forwards requests and processes responses. Cloud service should provide Gemini API compatible interface. If authentication is required, please fill in the Token.
ai.promptLibraryUrlHint: JSON data URL for prompt library, used for prompt selection in material generator

app.exportDirectoryHint: When set, exports will be saved directly to this directory without file dialog. Leave empty to use file dialog.
app.exportDirectoryPlaceholder: Leave empty to use file dialog

resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.
resetSuccess: Settings have been reset to defaults
saveError: Failed to save settings, please try again
discardConfirm: Are you sure you want to discard unsaved changes?

about.name: Software Name
about.author: Author
about.thanks: Thank you for using Indraw Editor!
